Description:
Some careers shine brighter than others.If you’re looking for a career that will help you stand out, join HSBC and fulfil your potential. Whether you want a career that could take you to the top, or simply take you in an exciting new direction, HSBC offers opportunities, support and rewards that will take you further.HSBC is one of the largest banking and financial services organisations in the world, with operations in 64 countries and territories. We aim to be where the growth is, enabling businesses to thrive and economies to prosper, and, ultimately, helping people to fulfil their hopes and realise their ambitions.We are currently seeking an experienced professional to join our team in the role of  Software Engineer.In this role, you will:Involve in writing test scenarios, creating test scripts, and execute the scripts.
Communicate effectively within the team and with the business when required.
Create automated test scripts using Selenium.
Responsible for the System Integration Testing by raising bugs and tracking them to closure.
Liaise with business and BAs to understand the requirements and trace them to test scenarios.
Work in sprints alongside the development teams across multiple platforms.Job Details
